originalText.text: Pertaining to the person who said dr patel needed to make his office wheelchair accessible. Is not Dr patel who needs to do it, is the building.  Besides his office isn't that big. Dr patel is an awesome doctor. He's been my doctor for over 10 years

text.text: Pertaining to the person who said dr patel needed to make his office wheelchair accessible. Is not Dr patel who needs to do it, is the building.  Besides his office isn't that big. Dr patel is an awesome doctor. He's been my doctor for over 10 years

originalText.text: I love this practice. They are kind and courteous. They can get busy at times, but they are wonderful providers who follow up on tests, referrals, authorizations, appeals, dealing with insurance, helping navigate care, and so much more. They are the nicest peeps around and couldn’t recommend this place any more.

text.text: I love this practice. They are kind and courteous. They can get busy at times, but they are wonderful providers who follow up on tests, referrals, authorizations, appeals, dealing with insurance, helping navigate care, and so much more. originalText.text:
One of the best doctors in the area! I have been with doctor for over 2 years and he is very understanding and truly cares for his patients. I was so comfortable discussing my issues with him.
Shout out to the whole staff which is so amazing and kind! Making appointments is very easy and no wait time.
Highly Recommended!!

text.text:

Shout out to the whole staff which is so amazing and kind! Making appointments is very easy and no wait time.
Highly Recommended!!

originalText.text: What a great doctor.  He listens to you. The staff is also amazing.  Thank you

text.text: What a great doctor.  He listens to you. The staff is also amazing.  Thank you

originalText.text:
Dr. Patel continues to be an amazing doctor. His staff is warm and friendly. His service surpasses every place I've ever been my entire life.

Thank you is not enough to express my gratitude.

I am updating my review. Dr. Patel is wonderful. His newer staff is a bit rudely at times but his level of expertise, bedside manner, and professionalism exceeds every doctor I have seen in my over 4 decades of life. I cannot imagine another doctor I would trust more. I can give him a timeline of events and he listens. And he knows what to do next and leads you to take control of your health.

He is so great that I have recommended friends from other boroughs and coworkers and they all have stuck with him. He is worth taking a trip to because if you are serious about your health you want someone who is serious about it as well.

Dr. Patel is very knowledgeable and professional. He is patient in explaining what needs to be understood. Very few Drs. Like him.
His staff are kind and polite. I will definitely be sticking to this office.
